tripText: Something to say about a good isolated vacation, completely unplugged!
The City of love held up to its reputation!
Of course we sang the song as we skipped across the bridge. It was a lot bigger than I thought.
Some how this perfect picture didn't even do it credit.
Really cool to walk around...I guess you can say I was entertained...
slowest taxi ever but still really cool.
Didn't get to put on a wig and yell at people but it was still pretty cool.
Warning, do not be afraid of heights. If you are not it leads to phenomenal views.
breeze in your face and no matter where you looked it looked like a picture in a travel magazine.
Perfect vacation spot to get away from everything and truly decompress.
tripTitle: If you have to ask where you cant afford it
